00019 shared_ptr<XNode>
00020 XDriverList::createByTypename(const XString &type, const XString& name) {
00021     shared_ptr<XNode> ptr = (*creator(type))
00022         (name.c_str(), false, m_scalarentries, m_interfaces, m_thermometers,
00023          dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriverList>(shared_from_this()));
00024     if(ptr) insert(ptr);
00025     return ptr;
00026 }

00051 void
00052 XDriver::readUnlockRecord() const {
00053     m_recordLock.readUnlock();
00054 }
00055 void
00056 XDriver::readLockRecord() const {
00057     m_recordLock.readLock();
00058 }
00059 
00060 bool
00061 XDriver::tryStartRecording() {
00062     return m_recordLock.tryWriteLock();
00063 }
00064 void
00065 XDriver::finishRecordingNReadLock(const XTime &time_awared, const XTime &time_recorded) {
00066     m_awaredTime = time_awared;
00067     m_recordTime = time_recorded;
00068     m_recordLock.writeUnlockNReadLock();
00069     onRecord().talk(dynamic_pointer_cast<XDriver>(shared_from_this()));
00070 }
00071 void
00072 XDriver::abortRecording() {
00073     m_recordLock.writeUnlock();
00074 }
00075 
00076 void
00077 XDriver::abortRecordingNReadLock() {
00078     m_recordLock.writeUnlockNReadLock();
00079 }

00081 XRecordDependency::tDependency::tDependency(const shared_ptr<const XDriver> &d, const XTime &time) :
00082     driver(d), time(time)
00083 {}

00085 XRecordDependency::XRecordDependency() :
00086     m_bConflict(false)
00087 {}
00088 XRecordDependency::XRecordDependency(const shared_ptr<XRecordDependency> &dep) :
00089     m_bConflict(dep->m_bConflict), m_dependency(dep->m_dependency)
00090 {}
00091 bool
00092 XRecordDependency::tDependency::operator<(const tDependency &d) const
00093 {
00094     return driver.get() < d.driver.get();
00095 }
00096 
00097 bool
00098 XRecordDependency::merge(const shared_ptr<const XDriver> &driver)
00099 {
00100     if(m_bConflict) return true;
00101     bool conflicted = false;
00102     if(!driver->time()) {
00103         conflicted = true;
00104     }
00105     else {
00106         m_dependency.insert(tDependency(driver, driver->time()));
00107         shared_ptr<XRecordDependency> dep = driver->dependency();
00108         if(dep) {
00109             if(dep->isConflict()) {
00110                 conflicted = true;
00111             }
00112             else {
00113                 for(tDependency_it dit = dep->m_dependency.begin(); 
00114                     dit != dep->m_dependency.end(); dit++) {
00115                     //! search for entry which has the same driver
00116                     tDependency_it fit = m_dependency.find(*dit);
00117                     if(fit != m_dependency.end()) {
00118                         ASSERT(fit->driver == dit->driver);
00119                         if(fit->time != dit->time) {
00120                             //! the same driver and different times 
00121                             conflicted = true;
00122                             break;
00123                         }
00124                     }
00125                     else {
00126                         m_dependency.insert(*dit);
00127                     }
00128                 }
00129             }
00130         }
00131     }
00132     m_bConflict = conflicted;
00133     return conflicted;
00134 }
00135 void
00136 XRecordDependency::clear()
00137 {
00138     m_dependency.clear();
00139     m_bConflict = false;
00140 }
